scene_end_anchor: This is the first scene of the book. No prior scenes have occurred. Arthur 'Artie' Penhaligon is currently standing in front of a malfunctioning vending machine.
constraints: establish Artie's deep-seated frustration with modern life
foreshadow game mechanics through mundane frustrations
